Hit first career homerun on 7/14/1985, off LaMarr Hoyt (NYY)...
Won World Series with Toronto in 1985...

Won World Series with Toronto in 1987...

Injured on 6/6/1990 with a Bruised Neck, out for 3 days...
Released by Toronto on 10/14/1991...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 5/3/1992 to a minor league deal...
